     no

2.25.20  4:38 pm   I don't know why but I find it hard to imagine you in any situations other than in the ones I've seen like playing an instrument or generally being alone and creative. do you exist outside of these video and actually interact with other people?

      yes

2.25.20  4:31 pm   HELP THIS IS NOT GOOGLE HOW DO I GO TO THE GOOGLE.

      you could try google.com

2.25.20  4:30 pm   what time signature(s) is i wanna be a movie star in?

      mostly 9/4, but the verses and bridge may have certain deviations from that

2.25.20  4:29 pm   Why does running hurt?

      because the earth keeps hitting you

2.25.20  4:28 pm   do you exist.

     oh that would explain a lot

      could be a gift, .... or a curse

2.25.20  4:12 pm   how do you record drums for your songs? they don't sound like midi and DEFINITELY don't sound like air drums

      i will demonstrate it all, in due time

2.25.20  4:08 pm   how soon do you think until you start instagram hints

      painstakingly soon

2.25.20  4:02 pm   i have a new job that i really enjoy, but sometimes i get really bored. it's frowned upon to look at my phone or even stand in one spot for too long. what do you recommend i do to keep my brain occupied?

     i have the ultimate solution for that, and it's called prime factoring huge numbers in your head

      i can sometimes get away with listening to music but sometimes i need to hear stuff so i can't

2.25.20  4:01 pm   oh god i really wanna drop out of school and i can do so if i want to, but i'm not sure if i should take that step yet

it's just ridiculous at this point. i keep telling myself to study but i just end up doing nothing. when i get bad grades i start bitching about it as if i don't know the reason as to why i'm such a bad student. i guess i've just lost all of my motivation to be a good student with healthy studying habits. might as well drop out since i can't stop procrastinating all the time.

i mean, why should i keep up with school anymore? i don't have any future plans or anything. plus i'm extremely lazy so i'm screwed.


should i just say "fuck it" and drop out, or should i somehow manage my way out of this stupid loop? help!!

      unfortunately i don't know very much about this. i realize it is extremely uncomfortable to attempt to participate in someone else's school, and that is possibly even more true for me than for most people (i am particularly incapable of learning things any way other than absolutely my own). but there's always this rumor that that particular school is threaded into the fabric of society in such a way that if you don't participate now, you may fall halfway down the social ladder. and while i think that may be partly true, i have also seen people use some very interesting alternate methods of climbing it, which can be extremely fun but you might have to believe in yourself, and the impossible, to a somewhat wild and lofty degree

2.25.20  3:53 pm   give me advice on life

      the first thing you wanna do is go ahead and get born

2.25.20  3:52 pm   are you learning 3D modeling?

      i will have to learn as i go

      5

      we'll see

      person

2.25.20  2:22 pm   Do you hate Irish people

      no. do you

2.25.20  2:07 pm   how do i figure out the chords in a song. i can't ever do it correctly it's so confusing

      the very first step in building this skill is just learning to find individual notes. that is not how you will find chords once you are good at it, but it is really the only way to start training yourself. so my first question is, are you able to match a note you've heard, using an instrument? you are allowed to try as many times as you like, but let's say you hear a note. are you able to play notes on your instrument until you find the note that is the same note that you heard. this is a core basic skill you will need to have, and i suppose you can develop chord building very gradually from that starting skill

2.25.20  2:06 pm   why are your songs so good?

      to appease the share holders

2.25.20  2:01 pm   how can i become a genius like you?

      all you have to do is climb exactly half way up the social ladder. that way everyone will be so confused by whether you are supposed to be high or low class, they have to assume: it must be genius

2.25.20  1:39 pm   Is the world going to change? 

      yes

2.25.20  12:58 pm   Can you give me some advice on how to get better at singing?

     it's quite simple. just keep singing

      And did you ever use autotune,

     no

      and if you did, in which songs?

2.25.20  12:55 pm   Can we talk about the paintings that can often be seen in your reality videos? Dod you paint them yourself?

      i thought i painted the blue one. but it's been so long i can't remember anymore

2.25.20  12:51 pm   What is true?

      i will see if i can make you a spreadsheet

2.25.20  12:51 pm   How many pumpkins?

      go ahead. count them

2.25.20  12:29 pm   is it true that you killed a capital letter once?

      no, but one thing i enjoy doing is bringing capital letters to LIFE. that could be what you are thinking of

2.25.20  12:28 pm   I'm really excited about what's coming next with the countdown timer getting closer to 0 and this period of you learning new shit

      me too, but also scared

     sure

      if yes, i'd like to see a sample one from you

      how about something like this

2.25.20  11:40 am   How do I change?

      just try to stay the same. i promise you that will never work

2.25.20  11:38 am   what should i do if i feel sad 

      compose a story of how you became sad. make it into a folk tale

2.25.20  11:36 am   how do i not consider doing bad things to myself

      you're gonna want to go ahead and consider other things instead

2.25.20  11:28 am   How are you? I'm genuinely wondering

      how can i be sure if you are truly genuine

2.25.20  10:55 am   What is your personal favourite song you've made?

     i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

      and what is your favourite song you haven't made?

     i would love to say, but that would put it at risk for someone to steal the idea

2.25.20  10:07 am   a friendly reminder that your anagram page exists and must be updated

      too bad, i've already reminded myself more times than you could ever imagine. something you may also be forgetting is that i have other pages too. i would update them all at the same time constantly, but no one has reminded me yet

2.25.20  9:54 am   I once saw someone here ask "so do I get friends" and you said "it's you, you are the friend, now go out there and be friendly". Is that your quote or did you hear it somewhere

      i made it up. but i suppose it may be loosely based on "be the change you wish to see in the world"

2.25.20  9:51 am   Opinion about questions?

      fake. everyone already knows the answer to everything

2.25.20  9:37 am   fuck eels i hate those long fuckers

      well, they hate you for being able to walk

2.25.20  9:13 am   how do you life

      the first thing you wanna do is go ahead and get born

2.25.20  7:45 am   Baked or Fried?

      i would be glad to evaluate whether i think a certain object is baked or fried. but if you do not point me to a reference object to evaluate, there is hardly anything i can do here

2.25.20  7:19 am   Do you think that Halo is maybe possibly not that good of a game? Am I crazy for thinking that?

      never tried it

      never heard of it

2.25.20  6:43 am   what's the ratio of your "music videos with a lot of meanings" is to "music videos that just spoke random words"?

      x:0, where x is the number of music videos i've made

2.25.20  6:32 am   How do you overcome creative block?

      you must think outside the block

2.25.20  5:36 am   what is hot dog made of

      nothing. and yet somehow, it exists

2.25.20  2:17 am   What's the optimal play speed for "slow down"?

      100%

2.25.20  2:07 am   Are you ever gonna collaborate with any artists in the future? 

      sure

2.25.20  1:03 am   Have you ever destroyed something your younger self made because you thought it was lame?

     no

      When i was a teenager i destroyed all of my many many childhood stories, diaries and artworks because i was embarrassed by how stupid i thought they were. It's a very big regret of mine. 

     i hate when people do that. they are destroying priceless artifacts of our universe

2.25.20  12:43 am   why do you think people like to hate on pop music?

      easy target

2.25.20  12:43 am   what's your approach to film scoring versus songwriting? seems much more anything-goes to me

      for scoring, it specifically has to enrich and enhance the video

      no, the specific reason for this is because i don't know which computer you have
